item.title: Terra Classic Community Veto Against “Six Samurai” Team Proposal To Revive LUNC, Here’s Why
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The Terra Classic community completely turned down the proposal to form the Terra Allies team of 6 senior engineering full-stack developers known as “Six Samurai“. While the community members agreed with innovative L1 and L2 developments shared in the $116,000 three-month spend proposal, most voted “No with veto“. This means the community disagrees with funding

The post Terra Classic Community Veto Against “Six Samurai” Team Proposal To Revive LUNC, Here’s Why appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Dogecoin Price Analysis: $DOGE Price Could Drop 12% if Buyers Lose this Key Support
item.dc:creator: Brian Bollinger
item.description:
Dogecoin Price Analysis: The recent recovery rally in Dogecoin price failed major resistance at a downsloping resistance trendline. This falling trendline has carried a downtrend for nearly two months, undermining the buyer’s attempt to establish a sustained bullish recovery. A recent reversal from the dynamic resistance indicates the DOGE price is poised for further downfall.

The post Dogecoin Price Analysis: $DOGE Price Could Drop 12% if Buyers Lose this Key Support appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Cathie Wood’s Ark Spot Bitcoin ETF Filing Amended
item.dc:creator: Anvesh Reddy
item.description:
Crypto Market News: The crypto market’s Bitcoin ETF frenzy continues to develop with many financial giants following Blackrock in filing for the spot Bitcoin ETF. In a latest development, Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest, which also filed an application with the SEC for a spot Bitcoin Exchange Traded Fund (ETF), made a change to its filing.

The post Breaking: Cathie Wood’s Ark Spot Bitcoin ETF Filing Amended appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Hong Kong Virtual Asset Consortium Considering Terra Luna Classic (LUNC)
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Hong Kong rating agency Hong Kong Virtual Asset Consortium (HKVAC) to consider including Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) in its digital asset index. The Hong Kong rating agency announced the initial list of cryptocurrencies for its large market cap index, but it also plans to announce other indexes to include more cryptocurrencies in its supported list.

The post Breaking: Hong Kong Virtual Asset Consortium Considering Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) appeared first on CoinGape.
item.content:encoded:
Hong Kong rating agency Hong Kong Virtual Asset Consortium (HKVAC) to consider including Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) in its digital asset index. The Hong Kong rating agency announced the initial list of cryptocurrencies for its large market cap index, but it also plans to announce other indexes to include more cryptocurrencies in its supported list.

The post Breaking: Hong Kong Virtual Asset Consortium Considering Terra Luna Classic (LUNC) appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Cardano Price Lifeline Danger As Robinhood Delists ADA – Are Losses To $0.22 Imminent?
item.dc:creator: John Isige
item.description:
Cardano price is dangling on the edge of a tall cliff following yet another investors rout bolstered by the crackdown lodged on the crypto market by the US Securities and Exchange Commission early this month. ADA, the token native to the Cardano ecosystem, was mentioned among the 64 cryptocurrencies the SEC alleged to be securities.

The post Cardano Price Lifeline Danger As Robinhood Delists ADA – Are Losses To $0.22 Imminent? appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: FTX Begins Talks To Restart And Rename The Exchange, Says CEO John Ray
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
Beleaguered crypto exchange FTX begins efforts to relaunch its international crypto exchange, despite losing its reputation in the market, according to a report by Wall Street Journal. The new management team of the crypto exchange detailed how nearly $9 billion in customer funds were misappropriated before the company’s collapse last year. FTX CEO John Ray

item.title: TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegs, Rises To 70% On Curve Pool After Prime Trust Disaster
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
While TrueUSD (TUSD) denies its exposure to crypto custodian Prime Trust, it has depegged for the second time this month. Prime Trust was placed into receivership on Tuesday after rival BitGo called off its bid to acquire Prime Trust. TUSD stablecoin fell to 0.9974 against Tether (USDT) on Binance and 0.80 on Binance.US amid exposure to

The post TrueUSD (TUSD) Depegs, Rises To 70% On Curve Pool After Prime Trust Disaster appeared first on CoinGape.
